00028 #include "RandomCellKiller.hpp"
00029 
00030 
00031 template <unsigned SPACE_DIM>
00032 RandomCellKiller<SPACE_DIM>::RandomCellKiller(AbstractTissue<SPACE_DIM>* pTissue, double probabilityOfDeath)
00033         : AbstractCellKiller<SPACE_DIM>(pTissue),
00034           mProbabilityOfDeath(probabilityOfDeath)
00035 {
00036     if ((mProbabilityOfDeath<0) || (mProbabilityOfDeath>1))
00037     {
00038         EXCEPTION("Probability of death must be between zero and one");
00039     }
00040 }
00041 
00042 
00043 template <unsigned SPACE_DIM>
00044 double RandomCellKiller<SPACE_DIM>::GetDeathProbability() const
00045 {
00046     return mProbabilityOfDeath;
00047 }
00048 
00049 
00050 template <unsigned SPACE_DIM>
00051 void RandomCellKiller<SPACE_DIM>::TestAndLabelSingleCellForApoptosis(TissueCell& rCell)
00052 {
00053     if (!rCell.HasApoptosisBegun() &&
00054         RandomNumberGenerator::Instance()->ranf() < mProbabilityOfDeath)
00055     {
00056         rCell.StartApoptosis();
00057     }
00058 }
00059 
00060 template <unsigned SPACE_DIM>
00061 void RandomCellKiller<SPACE_DIM>::TestAndLabelCellsForApoptosisOrDeath()
00062 {
00063     for (typename AbstractTissue<SPACE_DIM>::Iterator cell_iter = this->mpTissue->Begin();
00064          cell_iter != this->mpTissue->End();
00065          ++cell_iter)
00066     {
00067         TestAndLabelSingleCellForApoptosis(*cell_iter);
00068     }
00069 }
00070 
00071 
00073 // Explicit instantiation
00075 
00076 template class RandomCellKiller<1>;
00077 template class RandomCellKiller<2>;
00078 template class RandomCellKiller<3>;
